Argena designs and makes clothes, table cloths, bed sheets, pillow cases, etc which she sells for a living. She joined the credit program this year and is in her second cycle. She needs a loan to buy fabric to make more articles to sell. Selling these articles is her only source of income. With the money earned from her business she hopes to, one day, build a house and start a family.

Translated from Portuguese by Aline Pereira, Kiva Volunteer.

Argena e modista. Assim ela confecciona a roupa que vende.para alem de artigos de vestuario ela confecciona outro tipo de artigos tais como sacos de pao, toalhas de mesa, lencois com a respectivas fronhas,etc.Argena e solteira e ainda nao tem filhos. mas um dia pensa constituir familia.Ela entrou para o programa ainda este ano. Esta no segundo ciclo. Com os rendimentos ela pretende construir uma casa melhorada., pois que ela vive numa de pau a pique.Ela nao tem um outro emprego a nao ser a costura que ela faz para sobreviver.

loans.use: Argena will use her loan to buy more fabric to make the clothing and linens she designs and sells herself.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To increase inventory

loans.name: Maria

texts.pt:
Maria is married and has six children, two of them school-age. They live in Xai-Xai, Mozambique. Her husband works in a different city, which makes her the main person responsible for attending to the day-to-day needs of her children. She joined the program in 2005. Selling firewood from home has been a good business, one which has allowed them to start building a house. She will use her loan to buy more firewood to sell, as demand for it is growing. With the income from her firewood sales she is able to provide much help with the family's household expenses and to buy the materials to keep working on her house (in the picture Maria appears next to her unfinished house).

Translated from Portuguese by Aline Pereira, Kiva Volunteer.

Maria vive maritalmente com um homem com quem tem 6 filhos. Maria entrou para o programa em 2005. Ela vive num dos bairros perifericos da cidade de Xai-xai, o marido de maria trabalha numa outra Provincia. Por isso ela e quem cuida dos filhos a maior parte do tempo. os filhos mais velhos estao a estudar e os 2 mais pequenos ainda nao porque ainda nao tem idade escolar. Ela vende lenha na sua residencia. A lenha e muito procurada, por isso com os rendimentos ela ja iniciou a construcao da sua residencia usando material convencional.Mas talvex venha a tomar um outro emprestimo quando fechar este para a compra de material de construcao.Ela ajuda em grande medida o marido nas despesas da casa.

loans.use: Maria will use her loan to buy more firewood – which she sells from home.

loans.name: Constantino Jossefa

texts.pt:
Contantino's business of selling timber and clothing started doing much better since he joined the credit program, in 2005, and has allowed him to save enough money to get married and start a family. He is the father of a young child, now. His wife, who works as a housecleaner, also helps him in the business. He will use his loan to buy more timber and clothing articles to sell, and hopes to be able to build a brick house for his family in the near future.

Translated from Portuguese by Aline Pereira, Kiva Volunteer.

Costantino e casado e pai de 1 filho ainda pequeno.Ele casou ha pouco tempo.Ele entrou para o programa em 2005. Foi depois de entrar para o programa que conseguiu juntar dinheiro para poder casar. O negocio esta a correr bem.Ele pensa no futuro construir uma casa com material convencional para sua familia. A esposa de Constantino e domestica. Ela ajuda o marido no negocio. E um casal jovem ainda

loans.use: Costantino will use his loan to buy more timber and clothing articles to sell.

loans.name: Wafika

texts.en:
Wafika is a 51-year-old woman who lives with her husband and three children in the area of Hay El Sillum, a very poor neighborhood of the Southern Suburbs of Beirut. Wafika has a shop in which she sells bottles of water. She also offers water delivery services in her neighborhood. She is requesting a loan of  $1000 to pay the yearly mechanic fees due for the minivan she uses water delivery. If she does not pay this tax, the minivan may be confiscated by the police. 
Wafika has received loans from Majmoua for the past four years. With the consecutive loans she received from the Institution, she was able to expand her business, generate more revenues and proudly raise her kids. She has an excellent history of on-time repayment.

loans.use: To pay the yearly mechanic tax for the minivan she uses in her business

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana is an artisan who makes “morraletes”, colored plastic bags that are used locally to tote purchases from the market. She is 22 years old and has two children. She belongs to a group called Brocal 5 along with Manuela Diaz Ruiz and Micaela Ruiz L., also artisans. Juana would like use her loan to expand her business by purchasing different colored plastics and wood molds.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn, Kiva Volunteer.

JUANA es artesana, teje morraletas hechos de plástico que utiliza la gente de su localidad para cargar las cosas que se compran en el mercado. Ella tiene 22 años, dos hijos. Pertenece al grupo llamado Brocal 5 junto con doña Manuela Díaz Ruiz (artesana) y doña Micaela Ruiz López (artesana). Con sus prestamos compraran plástico al por mayor en su variedad de colores y moldes de madera.

loans.use: Purchase supplies for her business.

loans.name: Djeneba

texts.en: Denedja S. sells fresh, exotic juices and water in the Abobo market, a populated suburb in the north of Abidjan. Djeneba has been in this business for many years to take care of her family and her children. She started her business on a very small scale. She then acquired, last year, a second-hand refrigerator with a loan from AE&I. She has since then improved her productivity and revenue. Djeneba lives with her cohabitant and their children in Abobo. She has been in the AE&I microcredit program since November 2004 and has received several loans that she has reimbursed in a very good manner.

loans.use: Denedja Soro will use the loan to purchase ingredients and sachets for exotic juice

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Improve her business.

loans.name: Ascencio

texts.es:
Ascencio lives in his own home with his wife and two children in the Las Lomas section of La Paz. He is employed as a carpenter, but he builds furniture from his home (for the kitchen, office, etc.) in his spare time to supplement his income. He has fulfilled his previous loan commitment, and looks for additional funds for the purchase of raw materials. With his previous loan, he was able to buy some tools and his goal is to establish his own workshop in the future.

His work and credit history make him an excellent loan candidate.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn, Kiva Volunteer.

Ascencio vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos en la calle mantilla de la zona de las Lomas de la ciudad de La Paz y trabaja como empleado de carpintería pero a su vez en su casa elabora muebles de cocina, barnizado de escritorios y otros para mejorar sus ingresos, El señor ya es cliente de Kiva, terminó de cancelar el crédito, y ahora vuelve a solicitar para compra de materia prima. Con el crédito anterior pudo comprar herramientas y su objetivo es poner un taller en un futuro no muy lejano El antecedente histórico con Impro lo califica como muy buen cliente y puede acceder a un nuevo crédito.

loans.use: Purchase raw materials to build furniture.

loans.name: Angela

texts.es:
Angela, a widow, lives in the Santiago Primero area of El Alto, next door to her daughter and son-in law. She sells food on one of the city’s busy streets.

She would like to use her loan to purchase a kiosk to better serve her customers and to improve the conditions under which she prepares her food.

She has previously worked with Impro for a loan and, given an evaluation of her credit history and cash flow, she would make a good loan candidate.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn, Kiva Volunteer.

Ángela vive en la calle 1 de la zona Santiago Primero de la ciudad de El Alto. Se dedica a la venta de comida en una de las calles populosas de la ciudad. Ella es viuda vive junto a su hija y su yerno. El crédito que Angela solicita será invertido en la compra de un kiosco y así mejorar la atención a sus clientes y las condiciones de sanidad necesarias para un negocio como es el de vender comida. Es el cuarto crédito con Impro. Angela es cliente de IMPRO desde el año 2005. La evaluación realizada la califica para otorgarle el crédito pues muestra un flujo de caja aceptable.

loans.use: Working capital.

loans.name: Maria De Loudres

texts.en:
Maria de Loudres is 27 years old and has four children. Maria makes and sells pastries to those that live near her home. She is part of a group of women, including Marta Marin Ovando (who sells traditional food) and Maria Hernandez Gomez (who sells clothing). With the loan Maria de Loudres and Marta will buy a stove so that they can produce a larger quantity of products and Maria Henandez will buy clothing of specific cuts in order to better supply her business.

Translated from Spanish by Casey Unrein, Kiva volunteer.

MARIA DE LOURDES, tiene 27 años, 4 hijos, se dedica a hacer y vender pasteles entre las personas que viven cerca de su domicilio.Pertenece al grupo Santiago 2 junto con doña Marta Marín Ovando (vende comida tradicional) y doña maría Hernández Gómez (vende ropa) Con su préstamo doña Maria y doña Marta compraran una estufa para poder hacer mayor cantidad de productos. Y doña Maria comprará ropa de distintas tallas para surtir mejor su negocio,

loans.use: Purchase of stove to increase food production and clothing to better supply customers.

loans.name: Matenin

texts.en: Matenin Traoré is a banana wholesaler in the market of Abobo, a populated suburb in the north of Abidjan. She is 41 years old and has been in this business for more than 10 years. Matenin has 3 children and lives with her cohabitant in Abobo. All her children go to school, and she is the main resource provider for her family. She pays all the school expenses of her children. She wants to purchase about 120 cartons of bananas to be delivered to restaurants in Abidjan.

loans.use: Matenin Traoré will use the loan to purchase bananas in bulk

loans.name: Vicenta

texts.es:
Vicenta is 27 years old and is married to a construction worker and together they have two children.

Vicenta works as a maker and vendor of tamales. She pertains to a group called Santiago 2, along with Mrs. Rosario O. Misanjos, who runs her own store, and Mrs. Lucila Velasco Velasco, who is also a food vendor. With the loan, Vicenta and Lucila will invest in kitchen appliances as well as buying ingredients for the foods they sell, while Rosario will purchase inventory for her store.

Translated from Spanish by Wendy Wise, Kiva Volunteer.

Vicenta tiene 27 años, dos hijos, su esposo trabaja como albañil en la construcción. Ella se dedica a la venta de tamales (hojas de maíz rellenas de pollo , carne o verduras)Pertenece al grupo Santiago 2 junto con doña Rosario O. Misanjos (tienda de abarrotes) y doña Lucila Velasco Velasco( venta de comida ). Con el préstamo doña Vicenta y doña Lucila invertirán en implementos de cocina y comprando los aditivos de sus comidas y doña Rosario comprará mas mercadería para abastecer su tienda .

loans.use: VENTA DE ALIMENTO TIPICO

loans.name: Esperanza

texts.es:
Esperanza, a married mother of two children (8 and 3 years old), lives in the Santiago Primero area of El Alto. She sells food on one of the city’s busy streets. Her husband is a teacher in a rural area.

Esperanza would like a loan to make the final payment on a phone line for her home (in Bolivia, upon a given deadline, phone lines are purchased and made personal property). Owning their phone line would help the family be in better contact with others and have the ability to more effectively react in case of any eventuality.

This would be her seventh loan with IMPRO, with whom she has worked since 2003. All her previous loans have been repaid, and a review of her work and credit history indicate she would qualify for this loan.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn, Kiva Volunteer.

Esperanza, vive en la calle 1 de la zona Santiago Primero de la ciudad de El Alto. Se dedica a la venta de comida en una de las calles populosas de la ciudad. Su familia actualmente consta de dos hijos de 8 y 3 años respectivamente. Su esposo se desempeña como profesor en el área rural. El crédito que ahora solicita será utilizado en la cancelación de la cuota final de una línea telefónica para su casa, (en Bolivia, hasta la fecha, las líneas telefónicas se compran y se convierten en propiedad personal) con lo cual la familia estará más en contacto y podrá reaccionar más rápidamente ante cualquier eventualidad. Es el séptimo crédito con Impro. Esperanza es cliente de IMPRO desde el año 2003 y todos sus anteriores créditos han sido pagados en forma regular. La evaluación realizada la califica para otorgarle el crédito

loans.use: Purchase of telephone line.

loans.name: Janeth

texts.es:
Janeth lives in the Ciudad Satelite area of El Alto.

She rents space in a central part of the city from which she provides Internet and photocopy services.

She has four children, ages 20, 11, 9 and 3. Her husband works as a policeman in an interior part of the country.

The loan would be used to purchase a copy machine and work supplies for her customers, as demand for photocopies has increased markedly at her business.

This is her third loan with IMPRO, with whom she has worked since 2005. Her two previous loans have been repaid under the agreed terms. A review of her work and credit history indicate she would qualify for this loan.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn, Kiva Volunteer.

Janeth vive en la calle 14 de la zona Ciudad Satelite de la ciudad de El Alto. Posee un local en alquiler en una zona céntrica de la cuidad en donde presta servicios de Internet y fotocopias. Su familia consta de cuatro hijos de 20, 11, 9,3 años respectivamente. Su esposo trabaja como policía destinado en el interior del país. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de una fotocopiadora, herramienta de trabajo, y así satisfacer a su clientela, pues la demanda de fotocopias se ha incrementado notablemente en su negocio. Es el tercer crédito con Impro. Ella es cliente de IMPRO desde el año 2005 y los dos créditos anteriores los ha pagado en su totalidad y en los plazos establecidos. La evaluación realizada la califica para otorgarle el crédito

loans.use: Purchase photocopy machine.

loans.name: Vidal

texts.en:
Mr. Vidal L. lives in his own home with his wife and six children in the western part of La Paz, in the zone Pasankeri Ladera. Mr. Vidal is a lower official in the national military and his wife is an employee in a personal residence. Recently they began building five new rooms on their house, which were built through a loan from this institution and personal savings. Of these rooms, four are completed and are occupied by the family. The loan applied for will be used for the completion of the construction of the last room. This is the sixth time that the family has applied for a loan. An analysis of the family shows good socioeconomic classifications and approves the loan. The family has been clients of IMPRO since 1997.

Translated from Spanish by Casey Unrein, Kiva volunteer.

El señor Vidal L. vive en casa propia en la zona de Pasankeri ladera oeste de la Ciudad de La Paz con su esposa y sus seis hijos; el señor Vidal es oficial de baja graduación en el ejército nacional y su esposa es empleada en un domicilio particular. Actualmente construyeron cinco habitaciones que fueron construidas con créditos en nuestra institución y ahorros propios, de los cuales están concluidas cuatro, las que están siendo ocupadas por la familia. El crédito solicitado será destinado a la conclusión de la construcción en obra fina de una habitación. Esta es la sexta vez que solicitan un préstamo y el análisis socioeconómico realizado los califica favorablemente y puede acceder a un nuevo crédito. Son clientes de IMPRO desde el año 1997.

loans.use: Completion of addition on home.

loans.name: Cresencia

texts.en:
Cresencia I. lives in her own home with her husband and three children in the city of El Alto (above La Paz) in the zone of Bethlehem’s Star. Cresencia puts the finishing touches on artisan rugs and other products that she sells in the city’s fairs. Her husband is a lower official in the national police. Her plot of land is walled and needs a home constructed on it. Her neighborhood is demanding construction on the land in order to gain access to more works from the mayor’s neighborhood improvement plan. The loan will be used for the construction of two rooms. This is the first time that Cresencia has applied for a loan. A socioecomic analysis has shown her to have good qualifications and approved the loan.

Translated from Spanish by Casey Unrein, Kiva volunteer.

La señora Cresencia I. vive en casa propia en la zona Estrella de Belén de la Ciudad de El Alto, con su esposo y sus tres hijas. La señora Cresencia elabora alfombras artesanalmente, productos que vende en las ferias de la ciudad de El Alto y su esposo es oficial de baja graduación en la policía nacional. Su lote de terreno se encuentra amurallado y se necesita construir una vivienda, pues el vecindario le esta exigiendo la construcción de la misma para acceder a obras de mejoramiento vecinal por parte de la alcaldía. El crédito solicitado será destinado a la construcción de dos habitaciones. Esta es la primera ocasión que solicita un préstamo y el análisis socioeconómico realizado la califica favorablemente y puede acceder a un crédito.

loans.use: Construction of two rooms

loans.name: Guisela Viviana

texts.en:
Guisela is a very diligent 23 year old woman who, at the cost of great force and sacrifice, has built a restaurant which was redeemed through the arduous work of her and her sister. The great responsibility of watching over her daughter is the driving force that increases her desires, especially now that Guisela is both the father and the mother of her small daughter. She is a single mother due to certain difficulties that she had with her husband a while ago. This motive is the reason she dedicates herself and her integrity to her work. Still, the restaurant lacks a few things. Therefore, Guisela wants to increase the amount of tables and fulfill the rest of the requests that she receives daily from her demanding customers. The objective is to increase the revenues, to better the life of her child, and thus share more happy moments with her sister and the business. The value of the applied for is $250, let us help this noble mother to fulfill her goals and to provide for the benefit of her daughter.

Translated from Spanish by Casey Unrein, Kiva volunteer.

Guísela es una señora de 23 años, muy diligente que a costa de mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio ha acondicionado un restaurante en el que se desempeña arduamente en compañía de su querida hermana.La gran responsabilidad de velar por su hija, es la que la motiva a incrementar sus deseos ya que ella es padre y madre para su pequeña, debido a algunas dificultades que tuvo con su esposo hace un tiempo, motivo por el cual ha decidido dedicarse íntegramente a su labor.Sin embargo el restaurante tiene todavía algunas carencias, es por ello que desea incrementar la cantidad de comedores y demás requerimientos que le solicitan a diario sus exigentes comensales con el objetivo de mejorar sus ingresos económicos e incrementar la calidad de vida de su retoño y así compartir más momentos de grata felicidad en su compañía. El monto que solicita es de 250 dólares, ayudemos a esta noble madre a conseguir cada una de sus metas para provecho de su hijita.

loans.use: Implementation of a small restaurant

loans.name: Martha

texts.en:
Martha is a loving mother who, thanks to an excellent seasoning that possess, sells ka-bobs in the front door of a market. She has three young children whom are the source of her daily motivation, her motivation to continue working every day and night. Thanks to her work she has become very popular, such that at times she needs more space in order to fully attend her clients. For this reason she would like to purchase a small cart for frying potatoes and other things. This will enable her in time to open her own restaurant. Working like this she will be able to complete the construction of her house. They now live in the house of a friend which they pay rent to. With the crystallization of her desire, the construction of her home and a quick move will better the lives of her children and allow them to free themselves to happiness and liberty. The value that she asks for is $200, with this amount she will be able to begin to organize these new goals and with your help, to achieve them in little time.

Translated from Spanish by Casey Unrein, Kiva volunteer.

Martha, es una amorosa madre de familia, que gracias a la excelente sazón que posee se dedica a la venta de anticuchos en la puerta de un mercado, tiene 3 menores hijos, que son su fuente de motivación diaria, para seguir trabajando todos los días por las tardes.Gracias a esta actividad se ha hecho muy conocida, de manera que a veces necesita un espacio más amplio para poder atender a sus clientes, por lo cual ha pensado en comprarse una salchipapera (carrito para freír papas y demás), para poder aperturar en determinado momento su propio restaurante.De esta manera podrá concluir con la construcción de su casa ya que ahora viven en casa de un familiar, al cual le pagan el alquiler del mismo. Con la cristalización de su deseo además de culminar con la construcción de su vivienda para mudarse pronto incrementará la calidad de vida de sus pequeños a fin de que estos puedan desenvolverse con mucha alegría y libertad por los rincones de su hogar.El monto que solicita es de 200 dólares, con los cuales podrá empezar a estructurar estas nuevas metas y que con tu colaboración podrá observarlas en poco tiempo

loans.use: Purchase of a small cart to fry potatoes

loans.name: Jesús Armando

texts.es:
Jesus Armando is 47 years old, a hardworking family man who has sacrificed in order to learn about commercial activities. His diligence allowed him the opportunity to open a small eatery to which he dedicates a great deal of time and effort. His business has been so well-received, that he often is not able to accommodate customer demand due to the small number of tables and space. He would like to use his loan to make improvements to help him better meet customer demand and to further his economic prospects. He is motivated in great part by his two children, and his hopes of securing a better future for them. We appeal to your kindness in helping this honest and diligent father with his business endeavor.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn, Kiva Volunteer.

Don Jesús Armando, de 47 años, es un vigoroso y noble padre de familia, que gracias a mucho sacrificio, pudo ganar experiencia en las actividades comerciales. Su continuo empeño le dió la posibilidad de aperturar una pequeña fuente de soda, en la que se dedica a diario laboriosamente.La gran acogida de este negocio a hecho que don Jesús, muchas veces no pueda atender a todos sus clientes, debido al pequeño espacio con el que cuenta, así mismo la poca cantidad de mesas que dispone no satisface las peticiones ni demandas de los jóvenes a quién gentilmente aguarda tarde a tarde, es por ello que desea implementar adecuadamente su local con todos los requerimientos que sean necesarios a fin de que el negocio pueda prosperar e incrementar las satisfacciones de muchas personas durante su permanencia.La gran motivación con la que cuenta son sus dos hijos por los cuales quiere seguir perseverando en esta labor y con el propósito de continuar solicita la suma de 175 dólares.Apelamos ahora a su buen corazón para poder contribuir con el crecimiento financiero de este noble y trabajador padre de familia.

loans.use: Make improvements to small eatery.

loans.name: Juana Marisol

texts.es:
Economic hardship has taught Juana many important lessons about survival and providing for her family. In an effort to improve her family’s situation, she decided to open a small grocery store in her home together with her mother-in-law. She brings enthusiasm and good cheer to her business every day, growing in popularity such that a number of local families rely solely on her store for their basic needs. Her tireless efforts have helped improve her quality of life, and she is highly motivated to continue to grow her business. To this end, she would like to expand the types of products she offers and to be able to offer them to her customers at better prices. With your support, we can make the wishes of this hard-working mother a reality.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn, Kiva Volunteer.

Tras varios años de decadencia económica por la que atravesaba su reciente matrimonio Juana obtuvo muchas lecciones de vida para sobrevivir y poder proveer el sustento diario a su familia, es así que con la ayuda de su suegra ella decide abrir una pequeña bodega en su casa y desde entonces gracias a su perseverancia y trabajo la conserva y obtiene de ella muchas satisfacciones; ha ido creciendo con el tiempo y en la actualidad está progresando aún más ya que se ha convertido en una de las pocas tiendas que abastece totalmente la demanda de muchas familias en la zona que actualmente habita, además con el trato amable que brinda cada día a sus clientes le garantiza una larga vida a su pequeño espacio de ventas. Su desempeño durante todo este tiempo ha podido contribuir notablemente con la mejoría de su calidad de vida familiar y sus tres queridos socios se han convertido en el mejor motivo para que siga deseando continuar con este trabajo.Su continua búsqueda la lleva ahora a desear incrementar la cantidad de artículos a fin de poder ofertar más productos a menor precio a cada uno de sus asiduos clientes para la satisfacción de sus necesidades.Con tu valioso aporte podemos hacer que el anhelo de una madre diligente se haga realidad.

loans.use: Purchase more goods/products for small grocery store.

loans.name: Brígida Fríjida

texts.es:
To give her family the best of herself, Doña Brígida has found many ways to provide each person's daily bread. The skill that her mother taught her, embroidery, has served her as a way of earning a living. But this is not the only place she excels; her flavorful tastes has made her into one of the best cooks in her area and she pleases her followers with varied dishes that she offers during holidays in her community. She has developed these abilities thanks to a decision she made 12 years ago to improve her way of life and her family's economic situation. Above all, she is motivated by the desire to see her children become good men and outstanding professionals. She has great dreams of improving herself and for these she is requesting a loan of $850 to acquire materials that she will use for her embroidery and to invest in various other home-based services that she performs. She is thankful to each one of the united hearts that decide to help her.

Translated from Spanish by Shannon Skoglund, Kiva volunteer.

Para dar lo mejor de si a su familia Doña Brígida ha visto mil formas de proveer el sustento diario a cada uno de sus miembros, es así que el oficio que le enseñó su mamá, el del bordado, le ha servido como un medio para ganarse la vida; pero no solo se desempeña en esta actividad, también su buena sazón la ha convertido en una de las mejores cocineras de su zona y siempre complace a sus seguidores con los variados platos que ofrece en la temporada de celebraciones de su comunidad. Estas habilidades las desarrolló gracias a la decisión que tomó hace 12 años para incrementar el nivel de vida y la economía de su familia. La motivan sobre todas las cosas, el anhelo de ver convertidos a sus hijos en unos excelentes profesionales y hombres de bien. Tiene grandes ideales de superación y por ello solicita un préstamo de 850 dólares para adquirir materiales que le sirvan para sus bordados e invertir en los diversos negocios que ella desempeña en la comodidad de su hogar. Desde ahora agradece a cada uno de los corazones solidarios que se decidan a ayudarla.

loans.use: Purchase of materials for embroidering various garments

loans.name: María Gladys

texts.es:
Maria is a native of Orcotuna and has stayed in her native land to progress there, that is why five years ago she decided to move forward with raising livestock. She began with just one cow and now has many. Every morning, Maria goes out early so that her beloved cows may graze among the hills all day in hopes that they return happy and satisfied.

Maria is motivated to continue in this arduous work by the thought of her eight children, who along with her husband, also help her with the cows.

In order to succeed in her business, Maria and her family look to nourish the animals and keep them happy, in hopes of ultimately selling them at a just price. Thanks to her continued activity in her occupation, Maria and her family are able to sustain themselves and this fills Maria with great satisfaction. However, with the support of this loan, she would now like to also purchase more species of livestock to increase her clientele. With your support, Maria will be able to accomplish her business goals thus, helping to fund the education of all eight of her children.

Translated from Spanish by Wendy Wise, Kiva Volunteer.

Doña Maria es natural de Orcotuna y se quedó en su tierra natal para progresar en ella, es por ello que hace 5 años decidió optar por la crianza de animales; comenzó con tan solo una vaca y en la actualidad tiene varias su habilidad para la crianza la heredó de sus padres que se dedicaron durante toda su vida a la ganadería y sumado al esfuerzo diario, con dedicación ha logrado llegar hasta donde está.Doña Maria cada mañana sale muy temprano para que sus queridas vacas ubiquen en el campo sus sustento diario y recorre cerros completos a fin de que regresen satisfechas y muy contentas, aunque el trabajo suele ser muchas veces agotador ella motiva su actividad cuando piensa en el futuro de sus 8 hijos que día a día la esperan muy contentos jugando en su hogar.Los mayores también participan en el cuidado de sus animales en compañía de su esposo para poder conocer e interactuar de cerca con esta noble actividad y buscan nutrirlos para venderlos a un precio que justifica su continuo esfuerzo.Gracias a esta actividad Doña Maria y su familia tienen el sustento diario y esto la llena de satisfacción. Sin embrago piensa seguir adelante y ahora desea comprar forraje y más animalitos de raza con el propósito de incrementar su nivel de vida y otorgarles una adecuada educación a su numerosa familia.Con tu valioso aporte podrá alcanzar sus sueños en corto tiempo.

loans.use: Compra de forraje y animalitos pequeños para su crianza y posterior venta.

loans.name: Alibala

texts.en: Alibala P. is a 67-year-old trader who owns his business in Imishli in the the southern region of Azerbaijan.  Alibala is married and has four children. He sells vegetables and fruits in the central street of Imishli. He has many clients among local people and he always gives discounts for permanent clients. Alibala has fifteen years of experience in this field and selling brought him and his family good income. But last year it was very hard for Alibala just to keep body and soul together because prices for products rose so much. He has decided to add some products  and start selling potatoes and onions, because these products are in top demand.  He has applied for 1200 USD for his purpose.

loans.use: Going to start selling potatoes and onions

loans.name: Parvana

texts.en: Parvana Q. is a 41-year-old farmer who raises pomegranates in the southern village Qaranur in the Saatli region of Azerbijan. She lives with her husband and two daughters. She has eleven years of experience in raising pomegranates. She sells pomegranates to the local bazaar traders for pomegranate juice. Pomegranates juice is in very high demand all across Azerbaijan because it has many vitamins and is very healthy. Selling pomegranates is the only one source in her family, Parvana's husband is unemployed. Parvana works very hard because there is high competition in this field. She is going to develop her business and has applied for a loan of 900 USD.

loans.use: Going to develop her business

loans.name: Vely Sofía

texts.es:
Vely is mother of four children who she loves very much and is always in her thoughts. Her continuing desire is to give them the best since they are the reason that she lives. For that she bought a sewing machine a year and half ago with some savings to make overalls. Thanks to this small business she was able to generate enough to negotiate her son’s documents to work in Japan. This hard and painful decision was made before the economic crisis that had few possibilities of development for the youth in the country. She hopes that her son returns soon so that they can open a large restaurant together in the downtown area of the city. She also wishes to improve her small business even though she had to abandon her business for a month due to health reasons. Help a mother who struggles and fights through every day with the objective to enjoy the company of her sons with this loan.

Translated from Spanish by Gabrielle Sham, Kiva Volunteer.

Vely es madre de 4 hijos a los que ama mucho y siempre se encuentran presentes en cada uno de sus pensamientos; su continuo deseo es brindarles lo mejor ya que son su razón de vivir, hizo que se decidiera a comprar hace año y medio con algunos ahorros una máquina de coser semiindustrial para confeccionar buzos a base de tela polar; gracias a este pequeño negocio de confección de prendas muy abrigadoras pudo generar lo suficiente para gestionar los documentos de su hijo con el objetivo de que trabaje en el lejano país del Japón.Esta dura y penosa decisión fue tomada ante la crisis económica con pocas posibilidades de desarrollo para los jóvenes por la que atraviesa nuestro país.Con la esperanza de que su hijo regrese muy pronto para que aperturen juntos un restaurante grande en el centro de la ciudad, se esfuerza mucho en cada una de sus actividades; y desea mejorar este pequeño negocio a pesar que había abandonado su centro de confección por un mes por motivos de salud. Apoya a una madre con muchas ganas de superación que lucha diariamente con el objetivo de disfrutar de la compañía de sus hijos.

loans.use: Improve her small sewing business.

loans.name: María Eugenia

texts.es:
Eugenia is a struggling woman who works hard every day to put food on the table for her four children that she cares for alone after separating from her husband 11 years ago. She decided to take control of her home and help her little ones get ahead by raising small animals and guinea pigs. Every day she works at this, accomplishing various tasks and devoting herself to raising the animals she sells regularly in the fairs and markets in her area. With the earnings that she gets from her work, she educates her children and is able to offer them a good life. Many times life has not permitted her to grant them fulfillment economically. Nevertheless she has always tried to devote herself to working at many jobs so that what happened many years ago will not happen again. For the good of her children, she is requesting a $400 loan that she will invest in purchasing a small bull and more fodder. Support Doña Eugenia in her efforts to get ahead. Together we can do it.

Translated from Spanish by Shannon Skoglund, Kiva volunteer.

Eugenia es una mujer esforzada que día a día trabaja con diligencia para ubicar el sustento diario para beneficio de sus 4 hijos a los cuales mantiene sola tras separarse de su esposo hace ya 11 años. Decide tomar las riendas de su hogar y sacar adelante a sus pequeños con la crianza de animales pequeños y cuyes. Así mismo cada día se esfuerza realizando diversos trabajos y con mayor diligencia en la crianza de animalitos que comercializa diariamente en las ferias y/o mercados de su localidad y con las ganancias que obtiene por su desempeño educa y les otorga bienestar a sus hijos.Muchas veces la situación no ha permitido brindarles un sostén económico adecuado para su desempeño. Sin embargo siempre ha tratado de dedicarse a más de una labor a fin de que no vuelva a ocurrir lo sucedido años atrás y para bienestar de ellos solicita un préstamo de 400 dólares que invertirá en la compra de un torito y más forraje . .Apoya a Doña Eugenia a seguir adelante, juntos podemos hacerlo.

loans.use: Purchase of fodder for guinea pigs and a small bull.

loans.name: Najiba

texts.en: Najiba Quilyeva is a 37-year-old farmer who keeps poultry  for selling in  Bilasuvar in the southern region of Azerbaijan.  Najiba is internally displaced person who fled from Jabrail region to Bilasuvar during the Azerbaijani-Armenian conflict. She has seven years of experience in raising poultry. She sells hens and eggs to the local bazaar traders and sometimes to her neighbors. Najiba lives with his husband and four children. Poultry is the only  source in their family. It is very hard to cover family needs keeping just poultry. Many times Najiba wanted to expand her business and purchase additional hens and also geese and turkeys, but children needs  and other family problems didn’t allow her to do it. Borrowing a loan is the only  possible way to expand her business and she has applied for 1000 USD. The estimated cost for poultry  is 10-15 USD.

loans.use: Going to purchase additional hens, geese and turkey

loans.name: Angela Jesús

texts.es:
Angela is very driven! She tries to make more money for the family by working hard each day. About 6 years ago, she decided to start raising 'cuyes'-guinea pigs. This way she pays for the education of her two kids who have high hopes for the future. They are currently attending a very prestigious school in town. She raises guinea pigs out of her home, and she later sells them according to her clients' demands. She prepares them ready to eat for the eating pleasure of the people in her town. Thanks to her successful business, she has been able to pay the bills together with her husband who is also in agriculture.

Since they both aspire for a great future, both have decided to expand their businesses with the sole purpose of improving their family living conditions and to help pay for their kids' education so that they can one day become good citizens in society.

Translated from Spanish by Carolina Zelaya-Kronlund, Kiva Volunteer.

Angela es una mujer esforzada que cada día da lo mejor de sí para incrementar la economía de su hogar, es así que hace 6 años toma la decisión de criar cuyes y de esa manera apoyar la educación de sus dos hijos que en la actualidad estudian en un prestigioso colegio de su localidad y tienen muchas ganas de superación y planes a futuro.Se dedica a la crianza de cuyes en su modesto hogar para comercializarlos deacuerdo a la demanda de sus clientes, ella los prepara y vende listos para su adecuada cocción para deleite de las mesas huancaínas. Gracias al éxito de esta actividad ha logrado estabilizar la economía de su hogar en compañía de su esposo que también se dedica a la actividad agrícola. Ante sus deseos de superación ambos han decidido incrementar sus respectivos negocios con el propósito de seguir mejorando su nivel de vida familiar y los estudios de sus pequeños para que en el futuro puedan convertirse en hombres y mujeres de bien útiles a su sociedad.

loans.use: To purchase more guinea pigs and more food for feeding

loans.name: Florci Glodovina

texts.es:
Glodovina is a diligent woman that pushes herself every day to earn the well being of her beloved family. She is the mother of eight children, each of whom she loves and treats equally. The need to give them the best has made her look for activities for their fulfillment and improvement, which is why she decided to devote herself to selling eucalyptus wood 12 years ago. With time her business has grown in spite of competition from the large lumberyards, and now she stocks many types of wood. The incredible physical strength Glodovina has makes is so she has no trouble in her role and can carry large pieces of wood. It's admirable that her daily drive has made it so now her family can build their own house. With her income they can also save for the benefit of her eight children, who are in school so they can make something of themselves and strive for their own self improvement. She dreams of establishing her own sawmill to increase her business and offer more services to her customers. Let's help this self-denying mother to achieve her goals for the benefit of her household.

Translated from Spanish by Shannon Skoglund

Glodovina es una mujer empeñosa que cada día se esfuerza para procurarle bienestar a su querida familia, es madre de 8 hijos a los cuales trata con mucho amor y equidad; la necesidad de darles lo mejor ha hecho de ella busque actividades para su desempeño y superación, es por ello que decide dedicarse a la venta de madera de eucalipto hace 12 años, con el tiempo ha crecido su negocio a pesar de la competencia de grandes madereras y comercializa ahora varios tipos de madera. La fuerza física increíble que tiene Glodovina hacen que se desempeñe sin ningún impedimento en su maderera y pueda cargar grandes piezas de madera, es admirable como cada día su empeño ha hecho que ahora su familia pueda estar construyendo su propia casa y todas las ganancias que ahora pueda atesorar son en beneficio de sus 8 hijos que están estudiando para que puedan valerse por si mismos y seguir esforzándose por su propia superación.Sueña con establecer un aserradero para poder incrementar su negocio y ofrecer más servicios a sus clientes.Ayudemos a esta abnegada madre a conseguir lo que se propone para beneficio de su hogar.

loans.use: Purchase of machinery to install a new service in the lumberyard

loans.name: María Antonia

texts.en:
Maria Antonia is 25, a housewife, and the mother of a two and a half year old son. In order to support him, she had to work outside of her home and opened a taco and hamburger business, since she can’t cover her household expenses with her husband’s earnings working at a national beverages company. Maria Antonia started approximately 2 years ago with a business that has been growing little by little, thanks to her efforts and with her husband’s help. He helps her during the weekends and in his free time.

María has a spot where she sells tacos and hamburgers. She needs assistance to make her business grow, by buying a steamer for cooking and kitchen utensils that she is lacking. She is requesting a loan for US$200.00, which she will repay in a 4-month term. Any help that you can provide will be greatly appreciated. With your help, she will be able to move forward.

Translated from Spanish by Gabriel Santamaria, Kiva Volunteer.

María Antonia, es una esposa y madre de familia que a sus 25 años está casada y tiene un hijo de dos años y medio, al quien, para poder mantenerlo, necesitó abrir un negocio fuera de su casa de venta de tacos y hamburguesas, porque lo que gana su esposo, quien trabaja en una empresa de bebidas nacionales, no le alcanza para los gastos del hogar. María Antonia empezó hace aproximadamente dos años con el negocio que poco a poco ha ido creciendo con el esfuerzo de ella y de su esposo quien le ayuda los fines de semana y en sus tiempos libres.

María tiene un local de tacos y hamburguesas el cual inició o, ayuda para poder crecer ese negocio al comprar unas vaporeras y utensilios que le hacen falta. Está pidiendo un préstamo por US $200, los cuales pagará en un plazo de 4 meses. Lo que puedas aportar ella te lo agradecerá con todo su corazón. Con tu ayuda ella podrá salir adelante.

loans.use: Buying kitchen utensils for her business.

loans.name: María De Jesús

texts.en:
María de Jesús Vazquez Péres develops a Mexican tradition that is important to keep: making piñatas. She started creating and selling piñatas for her neighbors and acquaintances 4 years ago. Today she has a wholesale customer. All began when she wasn’t able to afford the cost of school supplies for her two sons with her husband’s salary. María de Jesús works all day creating piñatas and her husband and children help her during their free time.

María de Jesús is requesting a credit for US$200.00 to be repaid at a 4-month term, that she will use in order to buy materials for the Holidays. This is the busiest time for piñata sales and she wants to be prepared and increase her income in order to be ready for the big expenses at the beginning of the year. With your help, she will be able to make her dream of growing her business come true.

Translated from Spanish by Gabriel Santamaria, Kiva Volunteer.

María de Jesús Vazquez Péres, recrea una tradición mexicana que es muy importante conservar, la elaboración de piñatas, desde hace cuatro años empezó a elaborar y vender piñatas a sus vecinos y conocidos y hoy tiene un comprador a mayoreo. Todo comenzó cuando el sueldo de su esposo no alcanzaba para pagar los gastos de libros y materiales que piden sus dos hijos en la escuela. María de Jesús se dedica todo el día a fabricar las piñatas, y su esposo e hijos le ayudan en sus tiempos libres.

María de Jesús está pidiendo un crédito de US $200 a 4 meses para poder comprar material para la temporada navideña, porque es la temporada en que más gente anda comprando piñatas y ella quiere prepararse para obtener mas ganancias y así asegurar los gastos fuertes de inicios de año. Con su ayuda ella podrá hacer realidad este sueño de crecimiento en su negocio.

loans.use: Buying raw materials for her products.

loans.name: Juana Pastora

texts.es:
Selling shoes by catalog is the way Juana Pastora earns money to help her son grow healthy. Three years ago Juana decided to sell shoes by catalog to her neighbors and friends. Little by little her customer base started to increase thanks to the support of her husband who sells shoes where he works.

Today Juana Pastora is requesting a $200.00 dollar loan from you to be paid in 4 months. With this help she will be able to buy shoes for winter season and also for those customer in search of a gift for their families or friends. With your help a family will have money to enjoy this Christmas.

Translated from Spanish by Yvette Diaz Kiva volunteer.

Vendiendo zapatos por catálogo es la manera en que Juana Pastora, ayuda a conseguir dinero para que su hijo pueda crecer saludable. Desde hace tres años Juana se decidió a vender zapatos por catálogo a vecinas y familiares, y así poco a poco empezó a abrirse camino entre clientes, y con la ayuda de su esposo vende zapatos a compañeros de la fábrica dónde trabaja su esposo.

Juana Pastora hoy está acudiendo a ustedes para que le puedan otorgar un préstamo de US $200 ofreciendo pagar este préstamo en 4 meses, con esta ayuda ella podrá comprar zapatos para vender en la temporada de invierno y en especial para esos clientes que buscan obsequios que regalar a sus familiares y amigos. Con su ayuda una familia podrá tener dinero para festejar esta temporada navideña.

loans.use: Purchase  products for her shoe business

loans.name: Leslie

texts.es:
Leslie is mother of 8 children and four still live with her. They study in a modest educative center of their small city and work in the elaboration of the coal, the other four children work outside their city and they take care of their new responsabilities with their respective families. Her husband works at a sawmill near their small home and he also contributes with their family expenses and he cooperates with the storing of the firewood. His work starts in the morning at 5 am. At this time he begins to receive the shipment of firewood for the elaboration of the coal with the aid of his children who help him accommodate the firewood to process it under his supervision. This team work has allowed them to create good products and expand their customer portfoloio. Due to the demand of the coal in the market they have to continue working in order to satisfy it and also to take advantage of this business opportunity. Lets help this family maintain the flame of their heart ignited and keep their spirits of growth and improvement.

Translated from Spanish by Yvette Diaz, Kiva volunteer.

Leslie es madre de 8 hijos, de las cuales cuatro viven con ella, estudian en un modesto centro educativo de su pequeña ciudad y trabajan en la elaboración del carbón, los otros cuatro hijos trabajan fuera de su ciudad y ahora velan y cumplen las obligaciones que les demanda la manutención de su nueva familia.Su esposo se desempeña como empleado de un aserradero cercano a su pequeño hogar y también contribuye con los gastos familiares y coopera con el acopio de la leña para su posterior venta. Su trabajo inicia a partir de las 5 de la mañana; hora en la que empieza a recibir el cargamento de leña para la elaboración del carbón con la ayuda de sus hijos quienes van acomodando la leña para procesarla bajo su supervisión y es así que el trabajo en equipo les ha otorgado buenos productos y una cartera de clientes muy amplia.Debido a la demanda del carbón en el mercado requieren seguir trabajando a fin de satisfacer el requerimiento y aprovechar la oportunidad de negocio que se viene generando.Ayudemos a que esta familia mantenga la llama de su corazón encendida manteniendo sus ánimos de crecimiento y superación.

loans.use: Purchase firewood

loans.name: Estela

texts.es:
Estela is a loving mother of two children; one is in high school and the other child sadly cannot study due to a permanent disability. She lives with her husband who has worked by her side for many years in the Bellavista market, where they have their own sales space, earned after long years of work and dedication. She began selling charcoal for her mother, because her family used to live near a sawmill and took advantage of the leftover wood to make this fuel that is so useful to other families in the community. With her mother as a teacher, she learned to run her business. Now, much later, she relies on the support of her husband, who is in charge of this work in one part of their home. Due to the demand that they have, they added a a small store to the house to meet the demands of their customers, local as well as those from the capital. And to meet the requirements of their project, they are requesting a $700 loan, promising to pay it back in six months. That way they can continue working and looking out for the well being of their family, particularly the needs of their little one at home. Let's help make Estela's dreams a reality so she can keep up her interminable energy for her family.

Translated from Spanish by Shannon Skoglund, Kiva volunteer

Estela es una amorosa madre de dos hijos, uno está en el colegio y el otro hijo lamentablemente no puede estudiar debido a que padece de invalidez permanente; vive con su esposo quien trabaja con ella desde muy temprano en el mercado de Bellavista donde cuentan con un espacio propio de ventas adquirido a través de largos años de trabajo y dedicación.Empezó en el negocio del carbón por su mamá porque anteriormente su familia vivía cerca de un aserradero y aprovechaban los pedazos que sobraban de las maderas para fabricar este combustible tan apreciado por las familias de su comunidad. Es así como con esta importante maestra aprendió como era el negocio, ahora después de mucho tiempo cuenta con el apoyo directo de su esposo quién es la persona encargada de esta labor en un espacio de su hogar. Debido a la demanda que tienen adicionó en su casa un pequeño almacén para poder satisfacer los pedidos de sus clientes locales así como los de la capital; y para cumplir con sus proyectos solicita la suma de 700 dólares, en calidad de préstamo con un compromiso de devolución de seis meses para seguir trabajando, continuar velando por el bienestar de su familia y seguir con el tratamiento que demanda su pequeño en casa.Ayudemos a que se hagan realidad los anhelos de Estela para que siga conservando su interminable energía para bienestar de su familia.

loans.use: Purchase and supply of wood to make charcoal and increase sales.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.es:
In spite of her age and injuries, Alica continues to work in the field that she has known all her life. She makes charcoal from the remains of wood and boards left over from the sawmills. She is the mother of four children, and thanks to the earnings she generates, she has been able to educate each of her children, and each are fine men of means within their community. Currently, she works with her spouse in the preparation and sale of charcoal, and they have a sales space in the best market in the city. Due to the increasing demands of her clients, she finds herself in immediate need of more firewood to keep producing more charcoal. For this, she is requesting $600, which will allow her to purchase the pallets of wood from the sawmills for making fuel and cover her customer's needs. It will also ensure her sales and improve the quality of life for her family. She is very grateful in advance for your generous support.

Translated from Spanish by Shannon Skoglund, Kiva volunteer

Alicia a pesar D. su edad y dolencias, sigue desempeñando la labor que aprendió desD. pequeña; produce carbón D. las sobras D. las maderas y tablones que desechan los aserraderos; es madre D. 4 hijos y gracias a las ganancias que le generó y viene generando hasta hoy esta labor ha podido educar a cada uno D. sus hijos para que ahora se desempeñen como hombres D. bien dentro D. su sociedad. Actualmente trabaja en compañía D. su esposo en la preparación y venta del carbón ya que cuentan con un espacio D. ventas en el mejor mercado D. su ciudad; debido al incremento D. las solicitudes D. sus clientes se encuentra en la imperiosa necesidad D. comprar mas leña para poder seguir produciendo mas carbón. Para ello está solicitando la suma D. 600 dólares, esto le permitirá adquirir más lotes D. leña D. los aserraderos para la preparación del combustible con el que podrá cubrir totalmente las peticiones y además logrará asegurar su venta y mejorar la calidad D. vida D. su familia. DesD. ya queda muy agradecida por vuestra ayuda generosa.

loans.use: Purchase and supply of firewood for the production and sale of charcoal

loans.name: Silvia Florentina

texts.es:
My name is Silvia E.. I have dedicated myself to the sale of consumer goods for the past 4 years and I am doing well but I need to offer a greater variety of products for sale. I am requesting the loan to purchase meats, dairy products and canned goods. My customers are very loyal. They appreciate the manner in which I provide service and the prices and quality of my goods. With the additional income, I wish to purchase a refrigerator to expand the products I offer and provide for my family, which is most important.

Translated from Spanish by Christian Garcia, Kiva Volunteer.

Mi nombre es Silvia E. me dedico a la venta de productos de consumo popular, actividad que realizo hace 4 años en la cual me va bien, pero necesito tener mas variedad de productos para la venta, por eso estoy solicitando mi prestamo para poder comprar carnes, lacteos y embutidos, mis clientes son muy buenos ya que les gusta la forma en que los atiendo y tambien la calidad y los precios de mis productos, con la ganancia que obtenga deseo poder comprar un refrigerador para tener mas productos que necesiten refrigeracion tambien alimentar mi familia que es lo mas importante.

loans.use:
Purchase of milk, cheese, canned goods, poultry, beef, butter and sausages

compra de leche, queso, embutidos, carnes de pollo y res, mantequilla, chorizos

loans.name: Lilia

texts.es:
For the last ten years, Lilia has been selling charcoal. She is the mother of four children, the oldest of which works outside the family sphere, and the other three are in school. She lives with her husband, who purchases and resells local fruit, such as the aguaje and the ungurahui, to clients such as local ice cream stores. The two are thoroughly immersed in their jobs, trying to bring comfort and well being to each member of their family. They rely on a stand that is strategically located on a corner to offer their products from very early in the morning until six at night. Additionally, their patio serves as a store for them to decrease costs and send that money to increase the quality of life for their family. Currently, the demand has grown such that they find themselves needing to increase their capacity to keep up with the demands of their clients. With the increase in capital, they will earn more income for the benefit and health of their beloved children. Let's make this Peruvian family's search for unity and continued improvement possible.

Translated from Spanish by Shannon Skoglund, Kiva volunteer

Lilia se desempeña vendiendo carbón desde hace diez años, es madre de 4 hijos de los cuales el mayor trabaja y está fuera del cobijo familiar, los otros tres están en la escuela y vive con su esposo que trabaja comprando y revendiendo frutos regionales como el aguaje y el ungurahui teniendo como principales clientes a las heladerías de su localidad. De esta manera los dos están inmersos en la labor de brindarles bienestar a cada uno de los miembros de su familia. Cuentan con un puesto ubicado estratégicamente en una esquina, en el que ofertan sus productos desde muy temprano hasta las 6 de la tarde, además tienen un local en el patio de su casa que les sirve como almacén para abaratar los costos y destinar ese dinero para incrementar la calidad de vida de su familia. Actualmente debido a que la demanda se ha acrecentado se encuentran en la necesidad de aumentar su capacidad de compra para poder seguir cumpliendo con su exigente cartera de clientes. Así mismo con el incremento de su capital generará mayores ganancias para beneficio y bienestar de sus queridos hijos. Hagamos posible esta petición para que esta familia pucallpina pueda seguir unida y en continua mejora.

loans.use: Purchase and supply of charcoal to increase sales

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
My name is María V. and I sell creams, lipsticks, shampoos, lotions, fragrances and men’s shirts. I run my own business since a couple of years and I need the loan to purchase more items and increase the variety of my stock before christmas, the time of the year with the higher sales and be abble to feed my family with the profits.

Translated from spanish by Augusto Salazar, Kiva Volunteer.

Mi nombre es María V. me dedico a la venta de cremas, lápices labiales, shampos, lociones, perfumes, camisas para caballero, tengo mi negocio hace unos años, en estos momentos necesito el préstamo para poder comprar mas artículos y tener mayor variedad en mis productos ya que hacen falta muy pocos días para la navidad y en estos días es cuando mas se vende, con las ganancias que obtenga poder alimentar mi familia.

loans.use: Purchase of deodorants, nail polish, varnish remover, creams, lipsticks, lotions and  fragrances.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.es:
My name is Cecilia A. and I sell clothes for men, women and babys. I’ve been doing this for a couple of years and I have excelent customers who like my products and its quality. Nowadays, I need to buy more clothes to increase my stock and offer a larger variety of products to my customers. With the profits, I’ll be abble to support my home since I’m an aged person and this is the only job I can still do.

Translated from spanish by Augusto Salazar, Kiva Volunteer.

Mi nombre es Cecilia A. me dedico a la venta de ropa para bebes, damas y caballeros actividad que realizo hace unos años atrás, mis clientes son excelentes ya que les gusta mi producto y la calidad del mismo, en estos momentos necesito comprar mas ropa para poder tener mas inventario y así ofrecer mas variedad de productos a mis clientes, con las ganancias que obtenga poder sustentar mi hogar ya que soy una persona de la tercera edad y es el único trabajo que puedo realizar.

loans.use: Purchase of clothes for men, women and babys.

loans.name: Debmy

texts.es:
My name is Debmy O. and I sell clothes for ladys and gentlemen, bracelets, earrings, necklaces, purses, etc. I’ve been doing it for 3 years and my business is very succesfull since it’s located in a commercial area in the capital city. Nowadays, I need to get more products before Christmas wich is the time of the year with higher sales. With the profits, I wish to pay for my son’s studys and support my house which is difficult to me as I am a single mother.

Translated from spanish by Augusto Salazar, Kiva Volunteer.

Mi nombre es Debmy O. me dedico a la venta de ropa para dama y caballero, pulseras, aritos, collares, carteras etc, actividad que realizo hace tres años, mi negocio es muy bueno ya que estoy ubicada en una zona comercial de la cuidad capital, en estos momentos necesito abastecerme mas de producto ya que faltan pocos días para la navidad y en esta época es cuando mas se vende, con las ganancias que obtenga deseo poder pagar los estudios de mi hijo y mantener mi hogar el cual me es difícil ya que soy madre soltera y no tengo ayuda de nadie.

loans.use: Purchase of clothes for ladys and gentlemen, bracelets, earrings and purses.

loans.name: Sarelinda

texts.es:
Sarelinda’s family consists of her 2 little children, one new born and a baby, and her husband who drives a mototaxi and who is also a mechanic. She started selling spices as a child because her mother use to take her to the market after school. She was always inmersed in the market atmosphere. She first started as a street vendor until she got a stand at the Bellavista market thanks to her effort and her husband’s support. Due to a higher demand she needs to increase the variety and the number of spices to satisfy the large number of housewives that visits her every day. To achieve her purposes, she asks for a 700 dollars loan with a 6 months payback term to get more products and secure her family’s future.

Translated from spanish by Augusto Salazar, Kiva Volunteer.

La familia de Sarelinda está integrada por sus dos hijos pequeños, uno que recién está en el nido y el otro niño que apenas es un bebé, vive con su esposo que se desempeña como transportista en su mototaxi y también como mecánico. Ella empezó a vender condimentos a raíz de que cuando era niña su mamá la llevaba al mercado alternando sus estudios con el trabajo, siempre estuvo inmersa en la atmósfera mercantil, primero empezó en forma ambulatoria hasta obtener un puesto en el mercado Bellavista gracias a su esfuerzo y con el apoyo de su esposo. Ahora debido a la demanda que tiene se encuentra en la necesidad de abastecer su pequeño centro de ventas con más cantidad y variedad de condimentos para satisfacción de las innumerables amas de casa que la visitan a diario. Para lograr sus objetivos Sarelinda solicita la suma de 700 dólares en calidad de préstamo para ser devuelto en un plazo de seis meses con el podrá comprar más productos y de esta manera asegurará el futuro de su familia. .

loans.use: Purchase and supply of spices to raise sales.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
My name is Julia H. and I have dedicated myself to the production and sale of tortillas for the past 3 years. This line of business is very good since tortillas are an indispensable part of our community’s diet. Currently, I would like to increase inventory and production in order to grow sales. With the additional earnings I wish to provide for my family having 2 children that I desire to care for and provide education.

Translated from Spanish by Christian Garcia, Kiva Volunteer.

Mi nombre es Julia H. me dedico a la produccion y venta de tortillas, actividad que realizo hace 3 años, dicha actividad es muy buena ya que la tortilla es un alimento indispensable en nuestra comunidad, en estos momentos necesito incrementar mi inventario y produccion para tener unas mejores ventas y con las ganancias que obtenga poder alimentar mi familia ya que tengo 2 hijos a los cuales tengo que darles alimento y estudio.

loans.use:
Purchase of maiz, lyme, salt, firewood and matches

compra de maiz, cal, sal, leña, fosforos.

loans.name: Clarisa

texts.es:
Clarisa is the mother of three children. Her oldest daughter is studying at a university and the other two children are in high school. She lives with her husband, who is the one that gave her the idea of working in a new grocery store, since he works in a sales position in the market. Thanks to the tireless teachings of her husband, she began her commercial foray under the attentive supervision of her constant companion. She also counts on help from her two littles children who help work the busiest days in the store. Thanks to the quality of her services, she was soon able to count on the kindness of many people, which why she began to realize the need to increase the number of items she offers. Clarisa is very happy with her work and is committed to continuing her work for the benefit of her household.

Translated from Spanish by Shannon Skoglund, Kiva volunteer.

Clarisa es madre de 3 hijos, su hija mayor está cursando estudios en la universidad y los otros dos hijos están en el colegio; vive con su esposo que le dió la idea de trabajar en una nueva bodega, a raíz de que él cuenta con una puesto de ventas en el mercado.Gracias a la inquietud y enseñanzas de su esposo inició su travesía comercial bajo la supervisión y atenta mirada de su incondicional compañero adicionalmente cuenta con el apoyo de sus dos pequeños hijos quienes colaboran con su labor los días de mayor afluencia de público.Debido a la calidad de sus servicios en poco tiempo cuenta con la simpatía de muchas personas y por esta razón se ve en la necesidad de incrementar el número de artículos que ofertan; Clarisa está muy contenta con su labor y se compromete a seguir trabajando para beneficio de los miembros de su hogar.

loans.use: Purchase of groceries and stock for her grocery store to increase sales.

loans.name: Clarisa

texts.es:
Clarisa is the mother of three children. Her oldest daughter is studying at a university and the other two children are in high school. She lives with her husband, who is the one that gave her the idea of working in a new grocery store, since he works in a sales position in the market. Thanks to the tireless teachings of her husband, she began her commercial foray under the attentive supervision of her constant companion. She also counts on help from her two littles children who help work the busiest days in the store. Thanks to the quality of her services, she was soon able to count on the kindness of many people, which why she began to realize the need to increase the number of items she offers. Clarisa is very happy with her work and is commited to continuing her work for the benefit of her household.

Translated from Spanish by Shannon Skoglund, Kiva volunteer

Clarisa es madre de 3 hijos, su hija mayor está cursando estudios en la universidad y los otros dos hijos están en el colegio; vive con su esposo que le dió la idea de trabajar en una nueva bodega, a raíz de que él cuenta con un puesto de ventas en el mercado. Gracias a la inquietud y enseñanzas de su esposo inició su travesía comercial bajo la supervisión y atenta mirada de su incondicional compañero adicionalmente cuenta con el apoyo de sus dos pequeños hijos quienes colaboran con su labor los días de mayor afluencia del público. Debido a la calidad de sus servicios en poco tiempo cuenta con la simpatía de muchas personas y por esta razón se ve en la necesidad de incrementar el número de artículos que oferta; Clarisa está muy contenta con su labor y se compromete a seguir trabajando para beneficio de los miembros de su hogar

loans.use: Purchase of stock and storage for her grocery store to increase sales.

loans.name: Clara

texts.es:
Clara is a single mother who lives in a small home with her children; the oldest is married and the other two children are in high school in spite of the familial responsibilities that Clara has had to deal with. Still, she wasn't scared off, instead putting into practice a skill she had studied in her village's occupational school, cosmetology. Thanks to her consistency and faith, she began renting a space until she could get her own. She began her services precariously and with few tools, fighting against time to get new clients, something she managed faster than she could have imagined, thanks to the constant encouragement of her children. She relies on her son to help with the shopping for the business's needs; at the same time, he invites people to come visit her beauty salon. To keep working, she needs to buy new mirrors, accessories, furniture and other beauty tools. Hoping to make this happen quickly, she appeals to each of you to help her reach the amount she is requesting. Let's make her request possible so she can keep making the ladies that visit her beautiful and making the dreams of her children come true.

Translated from Spanish by Shannon Skoglund, Kiva volunteer.

Clara es madre soltera y habita una pequeña morada en compañía de sus hijos; la mayor está casada y los otros dos hijos están en el colegio a pesar de la carga familiar que tuvo que afrontar años atrás no se amilanó y puso en práctica lo que había estudiado en un centro ocupacional de su pequeña ciudad, la cosmetología, gracias a la constancia y la fe que nunca perdió es que empezó alquilando primero un espacio hasta conseguir uno propio.Sus servicios los inició en forma precaria con pocas herramientas de trabajo y combatiendo el tiempo hasta conseguir clientes cosa que logró en menos tiempo de lo que ella misma se imaginó debido al aliento permanente de sus hijos. Cuenta con el apoyo de su hijo para ayudarla a hacer las compras de los insumos de belleza, quien a su vez se encarga de invitar a los clientes que transitan para que visiten al salón de belleza.Para seguir trabajando necesita la compra de espejos nuevos, accesorios, muebles e insumos de belleza y con el propósito de llevar a cabo pronto su deseo recurre a cada uno de ustedes a fin de conseguir la cantidad que está solicitando.Hagamos posible esta petición para que siga embelleciendo a las damas que visitan su salón y los anhelos de sus hijos que aún se encuentran bajo su protección.

loans.use: Purchase of accessories for her beauty salon

loans.name: Leandro

texts.es:
Leandro has two daughters who are still in school. He and his wife separated years ago and since then he has been taking care of his daughters and a niece who also works with him in the small store they recently constructed near their home. Before owning the store, Leandro sold spare motorcycle parts, and due to the large number of clients who had not paid their bills, he had to liquidate the business and save the little money left in order to begin a new business. He is doing quite well in this new endeavor since he is located on a very busy street corner. He therefore needs to expand his building and stock his shelves with more goods. His goal is to install a drink vending machine in the near future. He promises to repay the loan in six months. He places all his hope in your hands so that he can help his family succeed.

Translated from Spanish by Alison Rives, Kiva Volunteer.

Leandro es padre de dos hijas, que aún están en el colegio, se separó de su esposa hace años y desde entonces viene haciéndose cargo y velando por el bienestar de las mismas y de una sobrina que colabora con él en la pequeña bodega que instaló hace poco en las inmediaciones de su hogar.Antes de tener la bodega contaba con el negocio de venta de repuestos de motocicletas y debido a la fuerte cartera de clientes morosos tuvo que liquidar el negocio e invirtió el poco dinero que tenía ahorrado para implementar el nuevo centro de ventas.Ahora esta avocado de lleno a esta ocupación ya que por estar ubicado en una esquina es muy concurrida y por ende necesita ampliar sus espacios y stock de artículos para beneficio de sus clientes.Leandro solicita la suma de 700 dólares , préstamo que le permitirá comprar y poder seguir invirtiendo en su bodega ya que tiene como meta en un futuro cercano poner una distribuidora de bebidas, el compromiso que asume para devolver la deuda es de seis meses, depositando todas su esperanzas en vosotros para seguir sacando adelante a su familia.

loans.use: To buy products to stock his store and increase sales.

loans.name: Betsy Carolina

texts.es:
Betsy always worked with her mother and ended up inheriting the business. She's single and has no children. She lives in her parents' house with her sisters who are students and help with the business that they have in the Hoyada marketplace. Through this business, Betsy is able to help cover education costs for her sisters. To fully take advantage of her time, she begins work very early and works from Monday to Sunday due to the demand for her products. She has a freezer at home and now the only thing that worries her is that she doesn't have her own stand in the marketplace to continue in her business endeavor. In order to obtain a spot and continue in her efforts, she is asking for a $700 loan. She can thus buy a spot in a better location. She is eternally grateful for your contribution.

Translated from Spanish by Alison Rives, Kiva Volunteer.

Betsy trabajó con su mamá siempre, y es de ella que heredó el negocio, es soltera y no tiene ningún tipo de responsabilidad familiar propia, vive en la casa de sus padres en compañía de sus hermanas que estudian y colaboran con ella en el puesto que tienen en el mercado la Hoyada; de esta manera ella las apoya colaborando con los gastos que generan sus respectivos estudios. Para no desaprovechar ningún momento del día empieza a trabajar desde muy temprano y de lunes a domingo por la demanda que tiene, cuenta con un congelador en su casa y ahora lo único que le preocupa es que no tiene un puesto propio en el mercado para continuar con su labor.Para adquirir un espacio y continuar con su desempeño solicita la suma de 700 dólares en calidad de préstamo este monto le permitirá obtener una mejor ubicación y queda desde ya eternamente agradecida por vuestra cooperación

loans.use: To buy a stand in order to sell meat.

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es:
Albert is a 43 year old man with four sons that are currently studying in the Zona de Puesto Fernandez High School. Albert dedicates himself to raising chickens; he raises and sells them from hatching, and the sales take him all across the Puesto Fernandez zone, Minero, and the city of Montero in Santa Cruz de la Sierra. He has no competition in the region, and now that he is the only chicken breeder in the area, the price of baby chickens is up to 5 bolivianos per unit. His present request is for the construction of his home. He currently has an outstanding loan to the Bank of the Andes for $1000 with a remaining balance of $750.

Translated from Spanish by Shannon Skoglund, Kiva volunteer

Alberto es una persona de 43 años de edad, su familia está compuesta por cuatro hijos varones que actualmente están estudiando en el colegio de la Zona de Puesto Fernandez. Alberto se dedica a la crianza de pollos, cría y comercializa los mismos desde que son bebes, la comercialización la lleva a cabo en varios lugares tanto en la zona de Puesto Fernandez, Minero y Montero de la cuidad de Santa Cruz de la Sierra. No tiene competencia en la zona, ya que es el único que tiene un criadero de pollos, los precios del pollo bebé están a Bs. 5.- la unidad. La presente solicitud es para la contrucción de su vivienda. Actualmente tiene una deuda vigente en el Banco Los Andes de $us. 1,000.- con un saldo deudor de $us. 750.-.

loans.use: Construction of home

loans.name: Yony

texts.es:
Yony is a selfless father of 4 who, with the support of his young 23-year-old wife, was able to convert a small rented room into his workshop. Thanks to his inherent talent for making beautiful and elegant handicrafts, he has become one of the most sought-after and recognized artisans in his city. After experiencing great economic difficulties, this young couple found a way to work and earn a living in order to get ahead and offer a better life for their chidren. Yony now wants to purchase an embroidery machine and enough raw material to be able to produce his craftwork and satisfy the great demand for his products. This is why he is asking for $200 to be able to invest in his business and continue to do what he loves. Yony promises to repay the loan within 6 months time. "Let's help make this young father's dreams come true and help him continue to improve develop his talent."

Translated from Spanish by Alison Rives, Kiva Volunteer.

Yony, es un abnegado padre de familia de 4 niños, con el apoyo de su joven esposa de 23 años, pudo implementar artesanalmente su centro de trabajo en su pequeña habitación alquilada, gracias al talento inherente que posee en la elaboración de sus elegantes y hermosos trabajos hizo que se convierta en uno de los artesanos más cotizados y reconocidos de su ciudad.Esta Joven pareja después de tener grandes problemas económicos encontró la manera de trabajar y ganarse la vida para salir adelante y brindar una mejor calidad de vida a sus niños.El deseo que tiene Yony es adquirir una máquina de bordados y suficiente materia prima para poder realizar sus trabajos, así cumplir con la gran cantidad de pedidos que tiene, para esto esta solicitando un préstamo de 200 dólares dinero que lo invertirá en su trabajo y le permitirá cumplir con su anhelo; Yony promete devolver el préstamo en un lapso de 6 meses. “Ayudemos a hacer realidad los sueños de este joven padre y a crecer con su talento”

loans.use: To buy an embroidery machine and raw material.

loans.name: Olga

texts.es:
Olga is 27 years old. She is young, enthusiastic, with a fighting spirit and big plans for the future. Since she was very young, she has always been very hard-working, talented, and energetic. Thanks to these qualities, she was able to learn different trades which she performs easily. After doing a variety of jobs, she was able to earn enough to be able to buy her own sewing machine with which she makes jogging suits, polo shirts, T-shirts, etc. This work satisfies her greatly, and it also allows her to cover personal expenditures and economically support her aging parents. She makes the clothes out of a small workshop located in her home daily from 6am to 5pm with the help of two other people, working hard everyday. Her greatest desire is to expand her business and eventually export her clothes. Currently, she seeks a $200 loan which will go towards buying more raw material to make her products. Let's work together to make Olga's dreams come true quickly and so that this young, diligent woman continues in her quest to overcome life's hardships.

Translated from Spanish by Alison Rives, Kiva Volunteer.
